import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function ViewSpeaker() { const [schedule, setshedule] = useState([]) const {id} = useParams(); useEffect(()=> { axios.get('http://localhost:4000/viewspaker') .then(schedule=>setshedule(schedule.data)).catch(err=>console.log(err)) console.log(schedule); } ,[]) return(
